name: 吳建文
objective:
世界各區域經濟快速發展，面對高度競爭的趨勢，數位轉型是項關鍵議題。本課程的目的是使學生了解數位轉型的方法論與工具，並介紹成功案使學生可以將案例經驗及所學應用於所屬公司或企業。
With the expeditious development in regional economic activities and more competition across countries, enterprise digital transformation is an important topic. The aim of this course is to introduce students the methodology and tools for digital transformation. Case studies and experience sharing are provided in this course.

第八週	資策會 (五): 數位轉型運用場域共創實證

第十週	人工智慧與數位轉型發展
